U

updateButtons() - Method in class view.PlayerBoardView
Updates build row and floor line buttons based on state.
updateScale(float) - Method in class view.CenterAreaView
Updates the scaling used by this representation so that it's consistent with its parent
updateScore() - Method in class view.PlayerBoardView
Updates the score indicator to match the player's current score.
updateTiles() - Method in class view.CenterAreaView
Updates the UI to match the underlying logical model
updateTiles() - Method in class view.CommonAreaView
Propagates update commands to all child views.
updateTiles() - Method in class view.FactoryView
Removes old tiles (if any) and creates new ones; updates buttons to match.
updateTiles() - Method in class view.PlayerBoardView
Updates build row, floor line, and wall tiles to match logical model.
updateTitle(boolean) - Method in class view.PlayerBoardView
Updates the window title to reflect whether it is this player's turn.
